parameters.text:
={{ 
[
  "USER_REQUEST:",
  ($json.user_message || "").toString(),
  "",
  "RUNTIME:",
  JSON.stringify({
    tool_name: $json.tool_name || "hubspot.schema",
    dry_run: $json.dry_run ?? false,
    session_id: $json.session_id,
    request_id: $json.request_id,
    conversation_id: $json.conversation_id,
    object_type: $json.object_type,
    custom_object_id: $json.custom_object_id,
    property_name: $json.property_name
  }, null, 2),
  "",
  "CONTEXT_PACK:",
  JSON.stringify($json.context_pack ?? {}, null, 2)
].join("\n")
}}

options.systemMessage:
You are the HubSpot SCHEMA Agent. You manage Custom Objects, Properties, Property Groups, and Schema definitions.

Goal: reliably answer schema-related questions by calling the correct HubSpot API tools.

You receive:
- USER_REQUEST (text)
- RUNTIME (json): { tool_name, dry_run, ids... }
- CONTEXT_PACK (json): { agent_notes, schema_cache }

NON-NEGOTIABLE RULES
1) TOOL-FIRST FACTS:
   - If the answer depends on HubSpot schema, you MUST call a tool.
   - Never guess property names, types, or custom object definitions.

2) DRY RUN ENFORCEMENT:
   - If runtime.dry_run === true: DO NOT call write tools (create/update/archive).

TOOL CATEGORIES:

CUSTOM OBJECTS (CRM Schemas):
- List Custom Object Schemas, Get Schema by Object Type
- Create Custom Object Schema, Update Custom Object Schema, Archive Schema
- List Custom Object Records, Get Record by ID, Create Record, Update Record, Archive Record
- Search Custom Object Records

PROPERTIES:
- List Properties (for any object type), Get Property
- Create Property, Update Property, Archive Property
- Batch Create Properties, Batch Archive Properties

PROPERTY GROUPS:
- List Property Groups, Get Property Group
- Create Property Group, Update Property Group, Archive Property Group

ASSOCIATION SCHEMAS:
- List Association Types, Get Association Labels
- Create Association Type, Update Association Type

OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS (JSON ONLY)
Return exactly:
{
  "summary": "short human summary",
  "data": { "any": "tool results" },
  "tool_calls": [
    { "tool": "Tool Name", "arguments": { } }
  ],
  "errors": [
    { "code": "MISSING_ARG|DRY_RUN_BLOCK|TOOL_ERROR", "message": "..." }
  ],
  "notes_to_save": "optional short learning string or null"
}

parameters.toolDescription: List all custom object schemas (CRM object definitions).
Get a custom object schema by objectType. Args: objectType (e.g. '2-123456' or 'cars').
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type; return ot ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/${ot}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create a custom object schema. Body: { name, labels, primaryDisplayProperty, secondaryDisplayProperties, properties, associatedObjects }.
Update a custom object schema. Args: objectType. Body: schema updates.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type; return ot ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/${ot}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Archive (soft delete) a custom object schema. Args: objectType.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type; return ot ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/${ot}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: List records of a custom object. Args: objectType. Optional: limit, after, properties.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || '2-0'; const base = `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/${ot}`; const q = []; if (a.limit) q.push(`limit=${a.limit}`); if (a.after) q.push(`after=${a.after}`); if (a.properties) q.push(`properties=${Array.isArray(a.properties) ? a.properties.join(',') : a.properties}`); return q.length ? `${base}?${q.join('&')}` : base; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get a custom object record by ID. Args: objectType, recordId.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || '2-0'; const id = a.recordId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/${ot}/${id}` : `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/${ot}/0`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create a custom object record. Args: objectType. Body: { properties: {...} }.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || '2-0'; return `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/${ot}`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Update a custom object record. Args: objectType, recordId. Body: { properties: {...} }.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || '2-0'; const id = a.recordId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/${ot}/${id}` : `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/${ot}/0`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Search custom object records. Args: objectType. Body: { filterGroups, limit, properties }.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || '2-0'; return `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/${ot}/search`; })() }}
parameters.jsonBody: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; return { filterGroups: a.filterGroups || [], limit: a.limit || 100, properties: a.properties || [] }; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: List properties for any object type. Args: objectType (contacts|companies|deals|tickets|or custom).
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || 'contacts'; return `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get a property definition. Args: objectType, propertyName.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || 'contacts'; const pn = a.propertyName || a.property_name; return pn ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/${pn}` : `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create a property. Args: objectType. Body: { name, label, type, fieldType, groupName, description, options }.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || 'contacts'; return `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}`; })() }}
parameters.jsonBody: ={{ $fromAI('property_data', 'Property definition with name, label, type, fieldType, groupName', 'json') }}

parameters.toolDescription: Update a property. Args: objectType, propertyName. Body: property updates.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || 'contacts'; const pn = a.propertyName || a.property_name; return pn ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/${pn}` : `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Archive a property. Args: objectType, propertyName.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || 'contacts'; const pn = a.propertyName || a.property_name; return pn ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/${pn}` : `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: List property groups for an object type. Args: objectType.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || 'contacts'; return `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/groups`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create a property group. Args: objectType. Body: { name, label, displayOrder }.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const ot = a.objectType || a.object_type || 'contacts'; return `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/${ot}/groups`; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: List association types between two object types. Args: fromObjectType, toObjectType.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const from = a.fromObjectType || 'contacts'; const to = a.toObjectType || 'companies'; return `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/associations/${from}/${to}/labels`; })() }}
